comments.en:
The Samsung CLP-320/325 (USB) and Samsung CLP-320N/325W (Net) are color laser printers with a 2011 street price of $119 USD and $149 USD. The case is white for the CLP-320, black for the CLP-325. Other than that, there is no difference.

This printer is supported by the foo2qpdl open software printer driver.

Consumables: Separate toner cartridges black (1500 prints, ~$54), yellow/magenta/cyan (1000 prints, ~$45 each), waste toner (5000 prints, ~$10), drum kit (24000 prints, ~$96)
